@BenjiJanssens mine is not an opinion, but rather based on evidence; I've seen too many young naive staff fall into this trap.
@BenjiJanssens @Canoodlez suggest reading up. Don't want the next gen of SoMe staff to think this is acceptable; I wouldn't hire as a result
@BenjiJanssens @Canoodlez it's basic media training. We gave it to all our players/drivers in my previous roles. There is a way to act.
@BenjiJanssens @Canoodlez i can point out numerous examples of employees being fired because of inappropriate comments made on their SM.
@BenjiJanssens @Canoodlez ..specifically if they have indicated they work for a brand. You are associated with that brand. It reflects.
@BenjiJanssens @Canoodlez every major brand I've worked for has had very clear guidelines on how employees need to react across social..
@BenjiJanssens @Canoodlez so much wrong with that statement. If you work in SoMe and state you work for a team, there absolutely is.
@BenjiJanssens @Canoodlez can only assume it's not a deeply offensive term in Denmark. Everywhere else that's sackable language.
@BenjiJanssens @Canoodlez find me an example of a professional running a bit social channel that uses language like that.
@BenjiJanssens @Canoodlez of professional sports teams, or esports teams for that matter. Have to remember your an advocate for the brand.
@BenjiJanssens @Canoodlez ...potential employees social background when hiring. This kind of language wouldn't be tolerated by the majority
@BenjiJanssens @Canoodlez of course she can say what she wants, but anyone in charge of SoMe should be smarter than this. I look at my..
Luggage delayed due to a technical fault. So you lost the key for the hold @British_Airways? Why did it take 25 mins to tell us that!
Guy at baggage claim talking about Craig David being on the flight. Doing the 'Craaaaaig David'. Currently unaware he's stood next to us.
@Canoodlez @BenjiJanssens ..this fashion. Ironic given your pinned tweet. Doesn't help our industry.
@Canoodlez @BenjiJanssens might want to state that. I'm not sure FC Copenhagen would appreciate any of their staff or players to act in...
@Canoodlez this doesn't seem like an appropriate way for someone representing a brand to talk...
